input_map_help: Please input unsharpened, filtered maps for best results.
mask_map_help: Use a mask to speed up segmentation by excluding regions of no interest.
target_map_help: Select the map from which detergent micelles should be removed.
threshold_help: Use volume viewer to select the right threshold to binarize the segmented map.
batch_size_help: Number of cubes in each batch. Larger batch sizes may require more GPU memory.
smooth_filter_help: Smoothens segmented map using a uniform filter of specified size. Helps to remove subtraction artifacts.
